dim.name: nCells
dim.description: The number of Voronoi cells in the primal mesh

dim.name: nEdges
dim.description: The number of cell faces (edges) in the primal and dual meshes

dim.name: maxEdges
dim.description: The largest number of neighbors that a primal mesh cell may have

dim.name: maxEdges2
dim.description: Twice the value of maxEdges

dim.name: nVertices
dim.description: The number of Delaunay triangles in the dual mesh, equivalent to the number of cell corners in the primal mesh

dim.name: TWO
dim.description: A constant value of 2

dim.name: THREE
dim.description: A constant value of 3

dim.name: vertexDegree
dim.description: The number of edges or cells that meet at vertices

dim.name: FIFTEEN
dim.description: A constant value of 15

dim.name: TWENTYONE
dim.description: A constant value of 21

dim.name: R3
dim.description: The dimensionality of vectors in $\Re^3$

dim.name: nVertLevels
dim.description: The number of atmospheric layers

dim.name: nVertLevelsP1
dim.description: The number of atmospheric levels, always one more than the number of layers

dim.name: nMonths
dim.description: The number of months in a year

dim.name: nSoilLevels
dim.description: The number of soil layers used by the land-surface scheme

dim.name: nLags
dim.description: The number of days affecting the deep soil temperature

dim.name: nOznLevels
dim.description: The number of prescribed pressure levels for input climatological ozone volume mixing ratios

dim.name: nAerLevels
dim.description: number of prescribed pressure levels for input climatological aerosol mixing ratio

dim.name: cam_dim1
dim.description: dimension of CAM radiation absorption save array

dim.name: nVertLevelsP2
dim.description: Two more than the number of atmospheric layers

dim.name: nlcat
dim.description: Number of landuse categories in the input data

dim.name: nscat
dim.description: Number of soil categories in the input data

dim.name: lat
dim.description: Number of latitude points in the input ugwp_limb_tau NGW file

dim.name: days
dim.description: Number of day-of-year points in the input ugwp_limb_tau NGW file

nml_option.name: config_time_integration
nml_option.description: Time integration scheme

nml_option.name: config_time_integration_order
nml_option.description: Order for RK time integration

nml_option.name: config_dt
nml_option.description: Model time step, seconds

nml_option.name: config_calendar_type
nml_option.description: Simulation calendar type

nml_option.name: config_start_time
nml_option.description: Starting time for model simulation

nml_option.name: config_stop_time
nml_option.description: Stopping time for model simulation

nml_option.name: config_run_duration
nml_option.description: Length of model simulation

nml_option.name: config_split_dynamics_transport
nml_option.description: Whether to super-cycle scalar transport

nml_option.name: config_number_of_sub_steps
nml_option.description: Number of acoustic steps per full RK step
nml_option.possible_values: Positive, even integer values, typically 2 or 6 depending on transport splitting

nml_option.name: config_dynamics_split_steps
nml_option.description: When config_split_dynamics_transport = T, the number of RK steps per transport step

nml_option.name: config_h_mom_eddy_visc2
nml_option.description: $\nabla^2$ eddy viscosity for horizontal diffusion of momentum

nml_option.name: config_h_mom_eddy_visc4
nml_option.description: $\nabla^4$ eddy hyper-viscosity for horizontal diffusion of momentum

nml_option.name: config_v_mom_eddy_visc2
nml_option.description: $\nabla^2$ eddy viscosity for vertical diffusion of momentum

nml_option.name: config_h_theta_eddy_visc2
nml_option.description: $\nabla^2$ eddy viscosity for horizontal diffusion of theta

nml_option.name: config_h_theta_eddy_visc4
nml_option.description: $\nabla^4$ eddy hyper-viscosity for horizontal diffusion of theta

nml_option.name: config_v_theta_eddy_visc2
nml_option.description: $\nabla^2$ eddy viscosity for vertical diffusion of theta

nml_option.name: config_horiz_mixing
nml_option.description: Formulation of horizontal mixing

nml_option.name: config_len_disp
nml_option.description: Horizontal length scale, used by the Smagorinsky formulation of horizontal diffusion and by 3-d divergence damping
nml_option.possible_values: Positive real values. A zero value implies that the length scale is prescribed by the nominalMinDc value in the input file.

nml_option.name: config_visc4_2dsmag
nml_option.description: Scaling coefficient of $\delta x^3$ to obtain $\nabla^4$ diffusion coefficient

nml_option.name: config_del4u_div_factor
nml_option.description: Scaling factor for the divergent component of $\nabla^4 u$ calculation

nml_option.name: config_w_adv_order
nml_option.description: Horizontal advection order for w

nml_option.name: config_theta_adv_order
nml_option.description: Horizontal advection order for theta

nml_option.name: config_scalar_adv_order
nml_option.description: Horizontal advection order for scalars

nml_option.name: config_u_vadv_order
nml_option.description: Vertical advection order for normal velocities (u)

nml_option.name: config_w_vadv_order
nml_option.description: Vertical advection order for w

nml_option.name: config_theta_vadv_order
nml_option.description: Vertical advection order for theta

nml_option.name: config_scalar_vadv_order
nml_option.description: Vertical advection order for scalars

nml_option.name: config_scalar_advection
nml_option.description: Whether to advect scalar fields

nml_option.name: config_positive_definite
nml_option.description: Whether to enable positive-definite advection of scalars

nml_option.name: config_monotonic
nml_option.description: Whether to enable monotonic limiter in scalar advection

nml_option.name: config_coef_3rd_order
nml_option.description: Upwinding coefficient in the 3rd order advection scheme

nml_option.name: config_smagorinsky_coef
nml_option.description: Dimensionless empirical parameter relating the strain tensor to the eddy viscosity in the Smagorinsky turbulence model
nml_option.possible_values: Real values typically in the range 0.1 to 0.4

nml_option.name: config_mix_full
nml_option.description: Mix full $\theta$ and $u$ fields, or mix perturbation from intitial state

nml_option.name: config_epssm
nml_option.description: Off-centering parameter for the vertically implicit acoustic integration

nml_option.name: config_smdiv
nml_option.description: 3-d divergence damping coefficient

nml_option.name: config_apvm_upwinding
nml_option.description: Amount of upwinding in APVM

nml_option.name: config_h_ScaleWithMesh
nml_option.description: Scale eddy viscosities with mesh-density function for horizontal diffusion

nml_option.name: config_num_halos
nml_option.description: Number of halo layers for fields
nml_option.possible_values: Integer values, typically 2 or 3; DO NOT CHANGE

nml_option.name: config_relax_zone_divdamp_coef
nml_option.description: Coefficient for the divergent component of the Laplacian filter of momentum in the relaxation zone

nml_option.name: config_zd
nml_option.description: Height MSL to begin w-damping profile

nml_option.name: config_xnutr
nml_option.description: Maximum w-damping coefficient at model top

nml_option.name: config_mpas_cam_coef
nml_option.description: Coefficient for scaling the 2nd-order horizontal mixing in the mpas_cam absorbing layer

nml_option.name: config_number_cam_damping_levels
nml_option.description: Number of layers in which to apply cam 2nd-order horizontal filter top of model; viscosity linearly ramps to zero by layer number from the top

nml_option.name: config_rayleigh_damp_u
nml_option.description: Whether to apply Rayleigh damping on horizontal velocity in the top-most model levels. The number of levels is specified by the config_number_rayleigh_damp_u_levels option, and the damping timescale is specified by the config_rayleigh_damp_u_timescale_days option.

nml_option.name: config_rayleigh_damp_u_timescale_days
nml_option.description: Timescale, in days (86400 s), for the Rayleigh damping on horizontal velocity in the top-most model levels.

nml_option.name: config_number_rayleigh_damp_u_levels
nml_option.description: Number of layers in which to apply Rayleigh damping on horizontal velocity at top of model; damping linearly ramps to zero by layer number from the top

nml_option.name: config_apply_lbcs
nml_option.description: Whether to apply lateral boundary conditions
nml_option.possible_values: true or false; this option must be set to true for limited-area simulations and false for global simulations

nml_option.name: config_restart_timestamp_name
nml_option.description: Filename used to store most recent restart time stamp

nml_option.name: config_pio_num_iotasks
nml_option.description: Number of tasks to perform file I/O
nml_option.possible_values: Integer valued, 0 $\leq$ config_pio_num_iotasks $\leq$ \# MPI tasks, 0 indicates all tasks perform I/O

nml_option.name: config_pio_stride
nml_option.description: Stride between file I/O tasks

nml_option.name: config_block_decomp_file_prefix
nml_option.description: Prefix of graph decomposition file, to be suffixed with the MPI task count

nml_option.name: config_number_of_blocks
nml_option.description: Number of blocks to assign to each MPI task

nml_option.name: config_explicit_proc_decomp
nml_option.description: Whether to use an explicit mapping of blocks to MPI tasks

nml_option.name: config_proc_decomp_file_prefix
nml_option.description: Prefix of block mapping file

nml_option.name: config_do_restart
nml_option.description: Whether this run of the model is to restart from a previous restart file or not

nml_option.name: config_do_DAcycling
nml_option.description: Whether to re-compute coupled fields $\theta_m$, $\tilde{\rho}$, $\rho u$, etc. from uncoupled fields when restarting the model; used for cycling DA experiments that analyze uncoupled fields in restart files

nml_option.name: config_print_global_minmax_vel
nml_option.description: Whether to print the global min/max of horizontal normal velocity and vertical velocity each timestep

nml_option.name: config_print_detailed_minmax_vel
nml_option.description: Whether to print the global min/max of horizontal normal velocity and vertical velocity each timestep, along with the location in the domain where those extrema occurred

nml_option.name: config_print_global_minmax_sca
nml_option.description: Whether to print the global min/max of scalar fields each timestep

nml_option.name: config_IAU_option
nml_option.description: Incremental Analysis Update scheme
nml_option.possible_values: `off' or `on'; `off' turns off IAU, `on' uses equal weighting of increments across the IAU window

nml_option.name: config_IAU_window_length_s
nml_option.description: Length of window over which analysis increments are applied

nml_option.name: config_jedi_da
nml_option.description: Whether this run is within the JEDI data assimilation framework; used to add temperature and specific humidity as diagnostics

nml_option.name: config_halo_exch_method
nml_option.description: Method to use for exchanging halos

nml_option.name: input_soil_data
nml_option.description: input soil use classification

nml_option.name: input_soil_temperature_lag
nml_option.description: days over which the deep soil temperature is computed using skin temperature

nml_option.name: num_soil_layers
nml_option.description: number of soil layers in Noah land surface scheme
nml_option.possible_values: Positive integers. For Noah LSM, must be set to 4.

nml_option.name: months
nml_option.description: number of months per year
nml_option.possible_values: Positive integer values. DO NOT CHANGE.

nml_option.name: noznlev
nml_option.description: number of prescribed pressure levels for input climatological ozone volume mixing ratios

nml_option.name: naerlev
nml_option.description: number of prescribed pressure levels for input climatological aerosol mixing ratio

nml_option.name: camdim1
nml_option.description: dimension of CAM radiation absorption save array

nml_option.name: config_frac_seaice
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of fractional sea-ice
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for sea-ice between 0 or 1; .false. for sea-ice equal to 0 or 1 (flag).

nml_option.name: config_sfc_albedo
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of surface albedo
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for climatologically varying surface albedo; .false. for fixed input data

nml_option.name: config_sfc_snowalbedo
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of maximum surface albedo for snow
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for geographical distribution; .false. for fixed input data

nml_option.name: config_sst_update
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of sea-surface temperature

nml_option.name: config_gvf_update
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of green vegetation fraction

nml_option.name: config_sstdiurn_update
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of diurnal cycle of sea-surface temperatures
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for applying a diurnal cycle to sea-surface temperatures; .false., otherwise

nml_option.name: config_deepsoiltemp_update
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of deep soil temperatures
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for slowly time-varying deep soil temperatures; .false. otherwise

nml_option.name: config_o3climatology
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of input ozone data in RRMTG long- and short-wave radiation
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for using monthly-varying ozone data; .false. for using fixed vertical profile

nml_option.name: config_microp_re
nml_option.description: logical for calculation of the effective radii for cloud water, cloud ice, and snow
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for calculating effective radii; .false. for using defaults in RRTMG radiation

nml_option.name: config_ysu_pblmix
nml_option.description: logical for turning on/off top-down, radiation_driven mixing
nml_option.possible_values: .true. to turn on top-down radiation_driven mixing; .false. otherwise

nml_option.name: config_urban_physics
nml_option.description: logical for turn on/off the urban physics parameterization
nml_option.possible_values: .true. to turn on the urban physics; .false. otherwise

nml_option.name: config_n_microp
nml_option.description: number of microphysics time-steps per physics time-steps

nml_option.name: config_radtlw_interval
nml_option.description: time interval between calls to parameterization of long-wave radiation

nml_option.name: config_radtsw_interval
nml_option.description: time interval between calls to parameterization of short-wave radiation

nml_option.name: config_conv_interval
nml_option.description: time interval between calls to parameterization of convection

nml_option.name: config_pbl_interval
nml_option.description: time interval between calls to parameterization of planetary boundary layer

nml_option.name: config_camrad_abs_update
nml_option.description: time interval between updates of absorption/emission coefficients in CAM radiation

nml_option.name: config_greeness_update
nml_option.description: time interval between updates of greeness fraction

nml_option.name: config_bucket_update
nml_option.description: time interval between updates of accumulated rain and radiation diagnostics

nml_option.name: config_physics_suite
nml_option.description: Choice of physics suite

nml_option.name: config_microp_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration for cloud microphysics schemes

nml_option.name: config_tempo_hailaware
nml_option.description: Logical flag to turn on/off prognostic graupel number concentration and rime density

nml_option.name: config_tempo_ml_nc_pbl
nml_option.description: Logical flag to turn on/off ML prediction of boundary layer cloud number concentrations

nml_option.name: config_tempo_ml_nc
nml_option.description: Logical flag to turn on/off ML prediction of microphysics cloud number concentrations

nml_option.name: config_tempo_ml_nr
nml_option.description: Logical flag to turn on/off ML prediction of microphysics rain number concentrations

nml_option.name: config_nssl_moments

nml_option.name: config_convection_scheme

nml_option.name: config_gf_sub3d

nml_option.name: config_lsm_scheme

nml_option.name: config_pbl_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration for planetary boundary layer schemes

nml_option.name: config_ngw_scheme

nml_option.name: config_ugwp_diags

nml_option.name: config_radt_cld_scheme

nml_option.name: config_radt_lw_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration for long-wave radiation schemes

nml_option.name: config_radt_sw_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration for short-wave radiation schemes

nml_option.name: config_sfclayer_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration for surface layer-scheme

nml_option.name: config_gfconv_closure_deep

nml_option.name: config_gfconv_closure_shallow
nml_option.description: closure option for shallow convection in Grell-Freitas convection scheme

nml_option.name: config_mynn_tkeadvect
nml_option.description: = true:do MYNN TKE advection

nml_option.name: config_mynn_tkebudget
nml_option.description: =1:option to add the MYNN TKE budget terms to output

nml_option.name: config_mynn_closure
nml_option.description: closure level for the MYNN TKE turbulence closure

nml_option.name: config_mynn_cloudpdf
nml_option.description: switch to different cloud PDFs to represent subgrid clouds in the MYNN PBL scheme

nml_option.name: config_mynn_mixlength
nml_option.description: mixing length in the MYNN PBL scheme

nml_option.name: config_mynn_stfunc
nml_option.description: option to switch flux profile relationship for surface (0:Dyer-Hicks, 1:Cheng-Brustaert

nml_option.name: config_mynn_topdown
nml_option.description: option to add top-down diffusion driven by cloud-top radiative cooling

nml_option.name: config_mynn_scaleaware
nml_option.description: option to turn on the scale-aware option

nml_option.name: config_mynn_dheat_opt
nml_option.description: option to activate heating due to dissipation of TKE

nml_option.name: config_mynn_edmf
nml_option.description: =1:activate the EDMF option in the MYNN PBL scheme (=0 otherwise)

nml_option.name: config_mynn_edmf_dd
nml_option.description: =1:activate the EDMF downdraft option in the MYNN PBL scheme (=0 otherwise)

nml_option.name: config_mynn_edmf_mom
nml_option.description: =1:activate momentum transport with the EDMF option of the MYNN PBL scheme(=0 otherwise)

nml_option.name: config_mynn_edmf_tke
nml_option.description: =1:activate TKE transport with the EDMF option of the MYNN PBL scheme (=0 otherwise)

nml_option.name: config_mynn_edmf_output
nml_option.description: =0:suppress the allocation of variables needed in the EDMF option of the MYNN PBL scheme

nml_option.name: config_mynn_mixscalars
nml_option.description: =1:activate mixing of scalars in the MYNN PBL scheme (=0 otherwise)

nml_option.name: config_mynn_mixaerosols
nml_option.description: =1:activate mixing of aerosols in the MYNN PBL scheme (=0 otherwise)

nml_option.name: config_mynn_mixnumcon
nml_option.description: =1:activate mixing of number concentrations in the MYNN PBL scheme (=0 otherwise)

nml_option.name: config_mynn_mixclouds
nml_option.description: 1:activate mixing of cloud condensates in the MYNN PBL scheme

nml_option.name: config_mynn_mixqt
nml_option.description: =0:activatevmixing of moisture species separately;= 1:activate mixing of total water in the mynn PBL scheme

nml_option.name: config_icloud_bl
nml_option.description: configuration for MYNN subgrid cloud coupling to radiation

nml_option.name: config_spp_pbl
nml_option.description: configuration for spp boundary layer

nml_option.name: config_tempo_aerosolaware
nml_option.description: Logical flag to turn on/off prognostic cloud droplet and aerosol number concentrations

nml_option.name: config_bucket_radt
nml_option.description: threshold above which accumulated radiation diagnostics are reset

nml_option.name: config_bucket_rainc
nml_option.description: threshold above which the accumulated convective precipitation is reset

nml_option.name: config_bucket_rainnc
nml_option.description: threshold above which the accumulated grid-scale precipitation is reset

nml_option.name: config_oml1d
nml_option.description: Whether to activate the 1-d ocean mixed-layer model

nml_option.name: config_oml_hml0
nml_option.description: If greater than zero, provides the constant, initial mixed-layer depth; if zero, initial mixed-layer depth will be taken from the `oml_initial` field.

nml_option.name: config_oml_gamma
nml_option.description: Deep water lapse rate in 1-d OML model

nml_option.name: config_oml_relaxation_time
nml_option.description: Relaxation time to initial values in 1-d OML
